description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Everyone knows Vikings are cool. But everyone doesn't know what Viking are crazy about ! It's a unique sport game : Tennis + Kung Fu + VolleyBall + Dodge Ball ! Hit first, think later !
